version_description:
We have been cooking up this tasty update for a while now and are so excited to share some new features and optimizations:
• One word: ANIMATIONS!!! Type your quote then tap the play button until you find an animation you like, 3 variations to choose from for now. Let us know what you think support@easytigerapps.com and we will add more!

• New Crop ratios for sharing to all your favorite places like Facebook cover photos or Wallpapers for your device!

• Several new free fonts for you to try and love!

• A handful of new fonts added to the premium font pack. These will be free if you already bought it!

• Christmas, Hanukah, and New Year’s Eve sticker packs with quotes and fun decorations for your edits. Make your own custom Holiday cards in Font Candy and spread a little cheer!

• Resolved bugs affecting photo albums and color selectors please let us know if you continue to have issues support@easytigerapps.com

As usual, feel free to email us support@easytigerapps.com if you have any questions or check us out on Instagram @easytigerapps to get some inspiration!

Show us your edits! We have optimized sharing to Tumblr and Instagram making it super easy to share your edits for a chance to be featured in the app and on our social channels. Post your edits directly from Font Candy with the embedded hashtags. We choose our favorites every week and feature them!

• We upgraded our slider bars making them less sensitive. It should be smooth sailing from now on but let us know if you’re still having issues!

• We also upgraded the Inspiration section of the app so we can showcase images of different size ratios like landscape and portrait. Send us some to post!

• Optimizations for the app to run smoothly fixing an issue causing the app to lag.

• More updates coming soon. Send us your suggestions, bugs, anything really, our ears are open! support@easytigerapps.com

We are so excited to bring you this update! We have some epic new features for you:
• UNDO is here! Simply shake to undo or redo your last step.
• Stay tuned for new Sayings coming every week in our Tending Sayings pack!
• Now you can design custom iPhone cases, magnets, and posters right inside the app!
• Have you checked out our new Geometric and 90’s artwork packs?! They are rad you’re gonna love them.

Follow us on Instagram @easytigerapps for tips, tricks, and inspiration!

4.7.3
•Bug fix for blend modes acting wack
•Fixed iPhone Case maker - go design your own cases and posters!

We are so excited to bring you this update! We have some epic new features for you:
• UNDO is here! Simply shake to undo or redo your last step.
• Stay tuned for new Sayings coming every week in our Tending Sayings pack!

• Have you checked out our new Geometric and 90’s artwork packs?! They are rad you’re gonna love them.

4.7.2
Follow us on Instagram @easytigerapps for tips, tricks, and inspiration!

We've added a few new treats for ya:

•Now easily switch out your background photos from inside the "image" panel. For those moments you've got a sweet edit but wanna change out the photo.
•New and improved experience for designing and ordering products. Now offering over 20 different products!
•Added Font Manager to help organize all of your Fonts. Hide the ones you don't use, and reorder your favs.
•Available upgrade to import your own fonts and artwork!

Bunch of bugs fixed including my personal fav, accurate ordering of your photos as they appear in your library. This was a tricky one, but hopefully no more lost photos for ya!

As always, don't hesitate to holler at us with any questions or feedback: support@easytierapps.com

Much love and have a safe (or maybe slightly dangerous) Halloween :)
<3 ET

4.8.2
•A few pesky bugs fixed

4.8.1

<3 ET

We added some new products for you to customize using Font Candy. We’ve added iPhone 7/7+ cases and are testing out some T-shirt options. Let us know what you think and what other products you’d like to see added to Font Candy!

To spread some Holiday cheer we’ve updated a few of our Artwork packs to include some new pieces for you all to use on your photos. Be sure to tag us @easytigerapps when you post, we love to see your creations!

We’ve fixed some glitching issues with our video tutorials to make sure you get the most out the the app. These pop-up and play at various points in the app and are meant to guide you through the different tools you are accessing. They only play very first time you open the app but you can always reset them by going to Settings > Reset Hints Videos.

Feel free to reach out to us support@easytigerapps.com if you need any help or just wanna say Hi.

Happy Holidays from the EasyTiger Fam!

You don't want to miss out on this delicious update! We've added some top requested features and some things we’ve been waiting to drop that will make editing with Font Candy even easier than before, including:

- Tool-tips that appear throughout the app so you get the most out of Font Candy. Look for the little purple bubbles to help you navigate the app’s features and tools.
- The option to automatically save your designs to the 'Your Sayings' folder. If you like a design you’ve already created you can apply it to any photo, anytime, in only a few taps. Pro tip: go to Settings to turn this option off/on ;)
- 2 words...GRID LINES! Now it’s even easier to line-up and balance your creations.
- New and improved color selector including pastel and earthy hues.
- If you've unlocked the the Import Tool, any artwork you add into the app will be saved to the 'Your Artwork' folder. Boom...watermark made easy!

**SPECIAL ANNOUNCEMENT**
Check out our new app HypeType : Add automatically designed motion typography to your Stories!

Need support? Email us support@easytigerapps.com
Wanna get featured? Tag us @easytigerapps

version_name: 5.0 is officially here and to go with that slick new icon we gave the the editing tools you love a fresh design. Same workflow and tools

version_description:
4.9.1
Bug fixes man

4.9
You don't want to miss out on this delicious update! We've added some top requested features and some things we’ve been waiting to drop that will make editing with Font Candy even easier than before, including:

- Tool-tips that appear throughout the app so you get the most out of Font Candy. Look for the little purple bubbles to help you navigate the app’s features and tools.
- The option to automatically save your designs to the 'Your Sayings' folder. If you like a design you’ve already created you can apply it to any photo, anytime, in only a few taps. Pro tip: go to Settings to turn this option off/on ;)
- 2 words...GRID LINES! Now it’s even easier to line-up and balance your creations.
- New and improved color selector including pastel and earthy hues.
- If you've unlocked the the Import Tool, any artwork you add into the app will be saved to the 'Your Artwork' folder. Boom...watermark made easy!

**SPECIAL ANNOUNCEMENT**
Check out our new app HypeType : Add automatically designed motion typography to your Stories!

version_name: 5.0 is officially here and to go with that slick new icon we gave the the editing tools you love a fresh design. Same workflow and tools

version_description:
Version 5.0 is officially here and to go with that slick new icon we gave the the editing tools you love a fresh design. Same workflow and tools, just a new look

We added a few other goodies for ya:

•You can now like your favorite Font Candy edits in the Inspiration-feed. Take a peek and show some love and be sure to submit your edits by posting and tagging us @easytigerapps on Instagram!

•Optimized the product making experience. Create your own iPhone case, t-shirts, magnets and more, right inside the app!

•Updated color palette with even more hues to choose from

•A bunch of new free hand-crafted filters

•New Trending Sayings added weekly. DM us with requests and we’ll put your quote in the app! @easytigerapps

Need support? Email us support@easytigerapps.com

5.1
- A few quick bug fixes
- Check out the Templates section to help get your next edit started. We add new ones every week.

5.0
Version 5.0 is officially here and to go with that slick new icon we gave the the editing tools you love a fresh design. Same workflow and tools, just a new look

We added a few other goodies for ya:

•You can now like your favorite Font Candy edits in the Inspiration-feed. Take a peek and show some love and be sure to submit your edits by posting and tagging us @easytigerapps on Instagram!

•Optimized the product making experience. Create your own iPhone case, t-shirts, magnets and more, right inside the app!

•Updated color palette with even more hues to choose from

•A bunch of new free hand-crafted filters

•New Trending Sayings added weekly. DM us with requests and we’ll put your quote in the app! @easytigerapps

Need support? Email us support@easytigerapps.com
We're always improving Font Candy and the rest of the Easy Tiger Photo Editing Suite. To make sure you don't miss anything just keep your Updates turned on.

Now you can Create T shirts!

We're always improving Font Candy and the rest of the Easy Tiger Photo Editing Suite. To make sure you don't miss anything just keep your Updates turned on.
This update is to prepare for a Major Update we will release in the near future.
- Just some improvement and bug fixes
Just some minor bug fixes
Stability improvements
- Just some improvement and bug fixes
Just some improvement and bug fixes
Minor adjustments and improvements
Performance improvements
We made a few improvements and fixed a small bug
Stability improvements
Rejoice, iPhone X users! We introduced the support to the super retina display so that you will have a more immersive editing experience.
Summer's almost over, and we've prepared a new version of Font Candy for you!  It fixes some minor bugs in the rendering of your project.

To make sure that you, beautiful minds, unleash your creativity at its fullest potential, we want to make sure that FontCandy works flawless.

This time we've found some not very pretty bugs and FIXED the hell out of them. No more updates in this version, but we'll try to surprise you next time!
¯\_(ツ)_/

Hi folks! No major news this time, just wanted to check up you. We worked on improving the app’s stability - try it out and let us know what you think!
Keep creating cool stuff with Font Candy, drink more water and call your mum - I bet she misses you. Cheers!

Hello Font-addicts!

The bad news: we discovered that we had a bug in the app.

The good news: we fixed the bug!

What’s good on your side? Share your latest news and best artworks with #fontcandyapp, we can’t wait to see them!
Hello! We had a small update to get rid of some minor bugs, so that you'll be able to continue creating your artwork in the coming months... Summer is here!

Hi folks! No major news this time, just wanted to check up you. We worked on improving the app’s stability - try it out and let us know what you think!

Keep creating cool stuff with Font Candy, drink more water and call your mum - I bet she misses you. Cheers!

Hello creators!
Make your Instagram stories shine with our pretty moving fonts! When your followers ask you the secret of this animated font magic - don’t be greedy, share love, hugs and FontCandy with the world!

Hello creative minds! It’s October, meaning for you it’s time to:
1. Take some cute photos in parks
2. Make them perfect with Font Candy “Autumn” artwork pack
3. Post’em and get all the likes! Oh yess!

And for us it’s time to polish the app a bit. In this version we got rid of a few of these nasty insects in the app. Eeeew.

Hello Users!
FontCandy is now completely updated, with a flashy new design.
All the features you already love are still there, and now even easier to use!
We also added a ton of new features including new fonts, shadow angles, and some fancy new preset templates!
Let us know what you think about it.
Cheers and love,
The FontCandy Team
